game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Tenria is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to wither and die.
game.ending: With the return of magic, the people of Tenria rejoice as their world is reborn. The hero, hailed as a savior, becomes known as the Bringer of Life.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to save their world, a group of survivors embark on a perilous journey to find the fabled Crystal of Life, said to hold the key to restoring magic and ending the curse. Along the way, they must battle fearsome creatures, overcome treacherous landscapes, and confront their own dark pasts.
game.title: Rebirth of Tenria
